attributes.action: Remove the new traffic lights on Bridge Street Morpeth
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the Dept for Communities and Local Government to support the people of Morpeth and the surrounding area in their demands for the removal of the new traffic lights at Bridge Street Morpeth. The introduction of these lights has created complete chaos in Morpeth town centre and the old mini-roundabout should be reinstated at the earliest opportunity.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Northumberland County Council.
